mapper.delete: DELETE FROM usersandmytransaction WHERE pid = #{pid} AND trid = #{trid}
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM post p JOIN usersandmytransaction uat ON uat.pid = p.pid JOIN mytransaction mt ON mt.trid = uat.trid WHERE mt.trid = #{trid}
AND p.pname LIKE "%"#{pname}"%"

SELECT * FROM post p WHERE p.pid NOT IN( SELECT p1.pid FROM post p1 JOIN usersandmytransaction uat ON uat.pid = p1.pid JOIN mytransaction mt ON mt.trid = uat.trid WHERE mt.trid = #{trid} )
AND p.pname LIKE "%"#{pname}"%"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO visitonemodile(mname, mdescribe, msequnce, mimageurl) VALUES(#{mname}, #{mdescribe}, #{msequnce}, #{mimageurl})
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM visitonemodile vo
JOIN mytransaction mt ON mt.mOneId = vo.mOneId JOIN usersandmytransaction uat ON uat.trid = mt.trid JOIN userspost up ON up.pid = uat.pid WHERE up.uid = #{uid} GROUP BY vo.mname

SELECT * from visittwomodile vtms WHERE vtms.mTowId IN ( SELECT uw.mTowId FROM userstowmodile uw WHERE uw.uid = #{uid}) OR vtms.mTowId IN ( SELECT pt.mTwoId from posttwomodile pt JOIN userdetail ud ON ud.position = pt.pid JOIN users u ON u.unum = ud.unum WHERE u.uid = #{uid})

select * from visitonemodile vom where mOneId in ( SELECT mOneId from visittwomodile vtms WHERE vtms.mTowId IN ( SELECT uw.mTowId FROM userstowmodile uw WHERE uw.uid = #{uid}) OR vtms.mTowId IN ( SELECT pt.mTwoId from posttwomodile pt JOIN userdetail ud ON ud.position = pt.pid JOIN users u ON u.unum = ud.unum WHERE u.uid = #{uid}) ) ORDER BY vom.msequnce
